exam.question: As we can no longer wait for the delivery of our order, we have to _______ it.

answer.explain: cancel order：  取消订单。 句意：  订购的货物尚未送到， 我们不能再等了， 不得不取消订单。 postpone：  推迟， 使延期； refuse：  拒绝， 谢绝； delay：  耽搁， 延迟， 延期。

sentences.sContent: I’m afraid I’ll have to cancel our meeting tomorrow.
sentences.sCn: 恐怕我得取消我们明天的会议。

sentences.sContent: You’ll just have to ring John and cancel.
sentences.sCn: 你只能打电话给约翰取消了。

trans.tranCn: 取消， 撤销； 删去
trans.tranOther: to decide that something that was officially planned will not happen

sentences.sContent: Because the gas is highly explosive, it needs to be kept in high-pressure containers.
sentences.sCn: 由于这种气体极易爆炸，因此需要保存在高压容器内。

sentences.sContent: A small explosive device (= bomb ) was set off outside the UN headquarters today.
sentences.sCn: 今天有一枚小型炸弹在联合国总部外爆炸。

synos.tran: [力]爆炸的；爆炸性的；爆发性的

phrases.pCn: 易爆气，爆炸气；爆炸性气体
烈性炸药；高爆炸药；猛炸药
易爆气体环境；爆燃性空气

words.tran: 爆炸了的；分解的；被破除的

trans.tranCn: 爆炸的； 极易引起争论的

trans.tranOther: a substance that can cause an explosion

sentences.sContent: Numerous attempts have been made to hide the truth.
sentences.sCn: 为掩盖事实作了很多尝试。

sentences.sContent: The two leaders have worked together on numerous occasions.
sentences.sCn: 那两位领导人已经多次合作。

sentences.sContent: ...those who longed for longevity visited Mount Hua on a regular basis because there were numerous medical herbs...
...I have already sweated through numerous in-class midterms and finals...
...the sound relationship between two generations requires the integration of numerous measures derived from the joint effort of parents...
